name: DeepEx
description:
Explore a mysterious region of the deep sea. DeepEx was conceived and created over a weekend, as part of Game Dev Unlocked - Game Jam #4. The theme for this game jam was "Underwater". The intention was to make a simple simple game over a weekend, using the assets I have available to me. The premise I came up with was a scavenger-hunt, in an interesting location, with fun and relaxing control. I think I met those primary goals! I would have liked to include dialogue of the player character speaking with a DeepEx colleague, and I would have liked to had more treasures. Maybe one day I'll add those features, but for now I'm pleased with the result! If you feel it's worth pursuing this game further, please let me know!

Controls InputControllerKeyboard/MouseMove
Left Joystick or D-PadWASD or Cursor KeysSwim Up/DownY/X (north/east buttons)
or Shoulder/TriggerC / Space
or PgUp/PgDnJump / SinkA (south button)CtrlOpen ChestX (or west button)E or EnterSprint/FastPress Left JoystickShiftCamera/LookRight JoystickMouse or NumKeysPause / See ControlsStartEsc Credits

Developed by Jason Leaver. (@HeyBishop on Twitter)
Animations and Character Controller by Malbers Animations. (@MalberShark on Twitter)
Models by Synty Studios.
Music by Michael Vignola, from Artlist.io.
